Depressed.message: You gently pet {pet_name}. {pet_name} wags {pet_name}'s tail weakly, feeling a bit better.

{pet_name} flinches slightly but stays still.

Equal.message: You pat {pet_name}, sharing a brief moment of mutual respect.

Curious.message: You pet {pet_name}, and {pet_name} sniffs around your hand, investigating curiously.

Relaxed.message: You rub {pet_name}’s belly, and {pet_name} stretches out in total contentment.

Nervous.message: You pet {pet_name} reassuringly, and {pet_name} slowly settles in your lap.

Unmotivated.message: You give {pet_name} a gentle pet, and {pet_name} lazily rolls over for a tummy rub.

Depressed.message: You gently place your fingertip against the glass near {pet_name}. Somehow, {pet_name} seems to cheer up, swirling its tiny legs in a hopeful dance.

Frustrated.message: You slowly move your finger in the water, giving a gentle 'pat' near {pet_name}. {pet_name} flicks its tail in annoyance at first, then calms down, as if realizing you mean no harm.

You attempt to stroke {pet_name} with a small net, but {pet_name} thrashes so wildly it bumps into the tank heater!

Happy.message: You try a playful 'shrimp pat' by wiggling your finger near the surface. {pet_name} zips around excitedly, as if returning the affection.

Sad.message: You cup your hand gently above the water, creating a soft current near {pet_name}. {pet_name} drifts closer, as if finding comfort in your presence.
You attempt to pat {pet_name}, but {pet_name} remains curled up in the corner, ignoring your comforting gesture.
You reach in too hastily, causing {pet_name} to panic. {pet_name} flicks into a rock and tumbles in a sad, clumsy spin.

Angry.message: You place a gentle finger in the water, and despite flaring its tiny pincers, {pet_name} eventually allows a slight 'pat' on its shell.

Afraid.message: You gently lower your finger near {pet_name}, letting {pet_name} feel the slight warmth. {pet_name} quivers, then inches closer, calmer than before.

{pet_name} panics at your touch and barrels headfirst into the aquarium glass, leaving {pet_name} momentarily stunned.

Excited.message: You swirl the water gently, and {pet_name} zips back and forth, letting you give a quick pat on its shell as it swims by.

Unmotivated.message: You create a gentle current, giving {pet_name} a light swirl-pat that nudges {pet_name} to swim a bit more.

Frustrated.message: You gently rub {pet_name}’s head, and after a moment of twitchy whiskers, {pet_name} calms down a little.

Happy.message: You pat {pet_name}’s soft fur, and {pet_name} responds with an adorable squeak, scurrying in joyful circles around your hand.
You try to pat {pet_name}, but {pet_name} is already so busy enjoying its day, sniffing around and ignoring you.
{pet_name} gets overexcited and leaps up to greet you, accidentally bumping its tiny head on your thumb!

Sad.message: You gently stroke {pet_name}’s back, and {pet_name} huddles closer, finding a bit of comfort in your touch.
You offer a pat, but {pet_name} remains curled up, letting out a small squeak of sorrow.
{pet_name} tries to move away but stumbles, landing face-first in its bedding, squeaking in surprise!

Angry.message: You slowly place your hand in front of {pet_name}, letting it vent its tiny squeaks before it grudgingly accepts a pat.
The mouse squeals angrily and snaps its teeth at your hand, rejecting the pat.
It charges your hand in a show of bravado, slips, and lands in its water dish, sputtering and squeaking!

Afraid.message: You move slowly and speak softly, placing one finger near {pet_name}. {pet_name} trembles but leans in, accepting the pat.
You approach too quickly, sending {pet_name} darting into a corner, trembling in fear.
Spooked by your hand, {pet_name} tries to leap away but collides with the cage bars, dazed.

Excited.message: You pat {pet_name}’s head, and {pet_name} scampers around in happy circles, squeaking in delight.
Your mouse is so energetic that it barely notices your pat, bouncing off to investigate new smells.
Mid-leap, {pet_name} tries to jump into your hand but overshoots, toppling into its food bowl!

Lonely.message: You reach into the cage and lightly stroke {pet_name}’s back, giving it the attention it craves.
You try to pat {pet_name}, but {pet_name} squeaks pitifully and stays in a corner, clearly wanting a fellow mouse instead.
It runs to greet you too quickly, slips on sawdust, and crashes into the water bottle!

Playful.message: You tap your fingers on the floor, and {pet_name} hops around, letting you sneak in a quick pat mid-bounce.
It’s so busy scampering around in play mode that your gentle pats go unnoticed.
The mouse tries to chase your finger but accidentally runs into a small toy, tumbling over with a surprised squeak.

Annoyed.message: You barely touch {pet_name}’s fur, respecting its space. {pet_name} huffs but allows a brief pat.
You press your finger on {pet_name}’s back, and {pet_name} squeaks loudly, stomping its tiny feet in irritation.
{pet_name} twitches in frustration at your pat, jerks away, and trips over its own tail!

Tired.message: You softly brush {pet_name}’s fur as it dozes. {pet_name} twitches its whiskers in a half-asleep response.
{pet_name} is too worn out and barely acknowledges your pat, just letting out a tiny yawn.
Your hand nudges {pet_name} unexpectedly, and the sleepy mouse topples over onto its side with a squeak.

Bored.message: You drum your fingers in front of {pet_name}, and {pet_name} perks up, letting you pat its head while it investigates.
You try to pat {pet_name}, but it remains listless, sniffing around without interest.
You attempt to liven things up with a quick pat, but {pet_name} startles and smacks into its exercise wheel!

Equal.message: You place your hand at the same level as {pet_name}. {pet_name} scampers onto it, giving a respectful nod of whiskers.
{pet_name} regards you with a neutral whisker-twitch and continues sniffing the cage floor, unimpressed.
You try to pat it respectfully, but {pet_name} steps on your finger at the same time, losing balance and flopping over!

Curious.message: You let {pet_name} sniff your hand first. {pet_name} then allows you to pat its ears, whiskers twitching in fascination.
It’s so busy exploring new corners of the cage that your pat goes unnoticed.
The mouse climbs your hand to investigate a smell and topples off the other side, squeaking in shock!

Relaxed.message: You gently stroke {pet_name}’s fur while it lounges, eyes half-closed. {pet_name} squeaks softly in contentment.
{pet_name} is so relaxed it barely moves an ear in response, continuing its snoozy sprawl.
You pat too eagerly, and {pet_name} rolls over in surprise, bumping its nose on the cage bars!

Embarrassed.message: You coax {pet_name} gently, and {pet_name} peeks out from behind its paws, accepting a soft pat with a sheepish squeak.
Your mouse tries to hide its face, whiskers trembling, too flustered to let you pat it.
The mouse attempts to hide behind a toy but trips over it, squeaking in mortified surprise.

Nervous.message: You place your hand calmly in the cage. After some sniffing, {pet_name} creeps closer, letting you stroke its back.
{pet_name} scurries away, squeaking anxiously at any movement, too on edge for a pat.
Spooked by a sudden sound, {pet_name} bolts and smacks into its water dish in panic!

Unmotivated.message: You offer a gentle scratch behind its ears. {pet_name} slowly stands, as if gathering the will to move about.
No amount of tapping or patting rouses {pet_name}—it just sits, whiskers drooping, ignoring your effort.
You try to nudge it into action with a pat, but {pet_name} flops over, bumping its head on the cage floor.

Depressed.message: You gently stroke {pet_name}’s fuzzy back while it sifts halfheartedly through some trash, offering a small flick of its ringed tail in appreciation.
You try to pat {pet_name}, but {pet_name} just stares into the distance, paws limp on an old soda can.
You move to pat it too quickly, startling {pet_name} into toppling a trash bin onto itself.

Frustrated.message: You sit beside {pet_name}, lightly patting its shoulder as it growls at a locked garbage can. It huffs but calms under your gentle touch.
You offer a consoling pat, but {pet_name} flings a banana peel at your hand, still annoyed at its rummaging failures.
You pat {pet_name} mid-tantrum, and it thrashes, sending trash flying. It slips on a greasy box and tumbles over!

Happy.message: You pat {pet_name}’s head, and {pet_name} chatters excitedly, hugging an empty chip bag like a prized treasure.
You try to pat {pet_name}, but it's busy gleefully rummaging through trash, barely noticing your attempt.
Overjoyed, {pet_name} leaps up at your pat, loses balance, and crashes into an overturned bucket!

Sad.message: You gently rub {pet_name}’s ears, and {pet_name} gives a lonely chitter, leaning into you for a moment of comfort.
You try to pat {pet_name}, but it stays hunched over a discarded pizza box, looking downcast.
Your hand startles {pet_name} mid-sulk, and {pet_name} yelps, stumbling back into a stack of tin cans.

Angry.message: You slowly approach {pet_name}, placing a gentle pat on its scruff as it hisses at a locked dumpster. Eventually, it settles down.
Your {pet_name} bares its teeth, refusing your attempted pat, too busy clawing at an unopened trash bin.
In a rage, {pet_name} spins to bite your hand but bites a crumpled soda can instead, yelping in shock!

Afraid.message: You lower your hand quietly, letting {pet_name} sniff your fingers before giving it a slow pat. {pet_name} trembles less, feeling safer.
Your sudden movement spooks {pet_name}. {pet_name} bolts behind a trash bin, peeking out with wide eyes.
Panicked by your approach, {pet_name} scurries away, slips on a greasy wrapper, and faceplants into the sidewalk!

Excited.message: You pat {pet_name}’s back, and {pet_name} chatters wildly, scurrying around a garbage pile, knocking lids off in glee.
It’s so pumped up that {pet_name} dashes back and forth, ignoring your pat attempts entirely.
Overexcited, {pet_name} tries to show off by climbing a dumpster, loses grip, and tumbles onto a pile of cardboard!

Lonely.message: You sit next to {pet_name}, lightly patting its side. {pet_name} chatters softly, scooting closer for company.
You offer a pat, but {pet_name} just whimpers softly, rummaging aimlessly through trash as though missing a fellow raccoon.
Desperate for companionship, {pet_name} climbs into your lap too eagerly and accidentally claws your leg, then falls off!

Playful.message: You pat {pet_name}, and {pet_name} responds by nudging a plastic cup at you, wanting a playful tug-of-war.
The raccoon is so busy batting cans around that it hardly notices your pat, rummaging happily on its own.
Your attempt to join the fun goes awry when {pet_name} leaps after your hand, misjudges the jump, and lands face-first in a paper bag.

Annoyed.message: You barely place your hand on its fur, respecting its mood. {pet_name} sighs but tolerates your light pat.
{pet_name} huffs and turns its back to your pat, rummaging noisily through trash to ignore you.
You pat too insistently, and {pet_name} spins around, tangling itself in plastic bags before tripping over a tin can!

Tired.message: You spot {pet_name} dozing in a pile of newspapers. A gentle pat makes {pet_name} chitter softly, half-asleep and too lazy to resist.
Your raccoon is too drained to respond, lying sprawled among stale food wrappers, ignoring your pat.
You disturb {pet_name}'s nap with a pat, and {pet_name} jolts awake, rolling off a stack of magazines with a sleepy yelp!

Bored.message: You drum your fingers, inviting {pet_name} to investigate. {pet_name} sniffs around, letting you sneak in a quick pat to cure its boredom.
No matter your pat, {pet_name} remains bored, lazily flicking through junk, uninterested in your attention.
In an attempt to amuse {pet_name}, you rustle a plastic bag, but {pet_name} jumps in surprise and bashes its head on the dumpster lid!

Equal.message: You sit down at {pet_name}’s level, offering a respectful pat. {pet_name} nods in trashy solidarity, sharing a brief moment of mutual understanding.
You show your hand politely, but {pet_name} merely glances at you, continuing its rummaging without malice or excitement.
You attempt a balanced pat, but {pet_name} shifts unexpectedly, tangling itself in old netting and flopping over!

Curious.message: You hold out your hand, and {pet_name} sniffs each finger curiously. It then allows a slight pat on its ringed tail.
It’s too busy exploring a new stash of trash, ignoring your pat as it unearths treasure: a half-eaten donut!
{pet_name} tries to investigate your pockets, loses balance, and falls into a tipped-over garbage bin!

Relaxed.message: You find {pet_name} lounging in a comfy nest of newspapers. A gentle pat gets a soft chitter of contentment.
{pet_name} is so calm it barely acknowledges your pat, continuing to sprawl among discarded wrapping papers.
You pat it a bit too enthusiastically, and {pet_name} rolls over in surprise, tumbling off its cozy trash pile!

Embarrassed.message: You pat {pet_name} gently, and {pet_name} hides its face behind its paws, flustered but somewhat appreciative.
It seems too shy to accept your pat, turning away and pretending to rummage with forced nonchalance.
Trying to act cool, {pet_name} attempts a fancy climb but slips, toppling headfirst into a trash lid with a loud clang!

Nervous.message: You stay still, letting {pet_name} approach on its own. Eventually, it sniffs you and allows a quick pat before retreating.
The raccoon jitters at every noise, flinching away each time you try to pat it.
A sudden crash spooks {pet_name}, sending {pet_name} fleeing into a pile of glass bottles, clinking and crashing!

Unmotivated.message: You pat {pet_name}, encouraging it to rummage. {pet_name} sluggishly sifts through trash, seeming a bit more engaged.
Your {pet_name} hardly stirs despite your pat, lacking the energy even to rummage properly.
You nudge {pet_name} to move, but {pet_name} halfheartedly slips on a wet cardboard, faceplanting into scraps of takeout!

Depressed.message: You gently stroke {pet_name}’s fuzzy back while it sifts halfheartedly through some trash, offering a small flick of its ringed tail in appreciation.
You try to pat {pet_name}, but {pet_name} just stares into the distance, paws limp on an old soda can.
You move to pat it too quickly, startling {pet_name} into toppling a trash bin onto itself.

Frustrated.message: You sit beside {pet_name}, lightly patting its shoulder as it growls at a locked garbage can. It huffs but calms under your gentle touch.
You offer a consoling pat, but {pet_name} flings a banana peel at your hand, still annoyed at its rummaging failures.
You pat {pet_name} mid-tantrum, and it thrashes, sending trash flying. It slips on a greasy box and tumbles over!

Happy.message: You pat {pet_name}’s head, and {pet_name} chatters excitedly, hugging an empty chip bag like a prized treasure.
You try to pat {pet_name}, but it's busy gleefully rummaging through trash, barely noticing your attempt.
Overjoyed, {pet_name} leaps up at your pat, loses balance, and crashes into an overturned bucket!

Sad.message: You gently rub {pet_name}’s ears, and {pet_name} gives a lonely chitter, leaning into you for a moment of comfort.
You try to pat {pet_name}, but it stays hunched over a discarded pizza box, looking downcast.
Your hand startles {pet_name} mid-sulk, and {pet_name} yelps, stumbling back into a stack of tin cans.

Angry.message: You slowly approach {pet_name}, placing a gentle pat on its scruff as it hisses at a locked dumpster. Eventually, it settles down.
Your {pet_name} bares its teeth, refusing your attempted pat, too busy clawing at an unopened trash bin.
In a rage, {pet_name} spins to bite your hand but bites a crumpled soda can instead, yelping in shock!

Afraid.message: You lower your hand quietly, letting {pet_name} sniff your fingers before giving it a slow pat. {pet_name} trembles less, feeling safer.
Your sudden movement spooks {pet_name}. {pet_name} bolts behind a trash bin, peeking out with wide eyes.
Panicked by your approach, {pet_name} scurries away, slips on a greasy wrapper, and faceplants into the sidewalk!

Excited.message: You pat {pet_name}’s back, and {pet_name} chatters wildly, scurrying around a garbage pile, knocking lids off in glee.
It’s so pumped up that {pet_name} dashes back and forth, ignoring your pat attempts entirely.
Overexcited, {pet_name} tries to show off by climbing a dumpster, loses grip, and tumbles onto a pile of cardboard!

Lonely.message: You sit next to {pet_name}, lightly patting its side. {pet_name} chatters softly, scooting closer for company.
You offer a pat, but {pet_name} just whimpers softly, rummaging aimlessly through trash as though missing a fellow raccoon.
Desperate for companionship, {pet_name} climbs into your lap too eagerly and accidentally claws your leg, then falls off!

Playful.message: You pat {pet_name}, and {pet_name} responds by nudging a plastic cup at you, wanting a playful tug-of-war.
The raccoon is so busy batting cans around that it hardly notices your pat, rummaging happily on its own.
Your attempt to join the fun goes awry when {pet_name} leaps after your hand, misjudges the jump, and lands face-first in a paper bag.

Annoyed.message: You barely place your hand on its fur, respecting its mood. {pet_name} sighs but tolerates your light pat.
{pet_name} huffs and turns its back to your pat, rummaging noisily through trash to ignore you.
You pat too insistently, and {pet_name} spins around, tangling itself in plastic bags before tripping over a tin can!

Tired.message: You spot {pet_name} dozing in a pile of newspapers. A gentle pat makes {pet_name} chitter softly, half-asleep and too lazy to resist.
Your raccoon is too drained to respond, lying sprawled among stale food wrappers, ignoring your pat.
You disturb {pet_name}'s nap with a pat, and {pet_name} jolts awake, rolling off a stack of magazines with a sleepy yelp!

Bored.message: You drum your fingers, inviting {pet_name} to investigate. {pet_name} sniffs around, letting you sneak in a quick pat to cure its boredom.
No matter your pat, {pet_name} remains bored, lazily flicking through junk, uninterested in your attention.
In an attempt to amuse {pet_name}, you rustle a plastic bag, but {pet_name} jumps in surprise and bashes its head on the dumpster lid!

Equal.message: You sit down at {pet_name}’s level, offering a respectful pat. {pet_name} nods in trashy solidarity, sharing a brief moment of mutual understanding.
You show your hand politely, but {pet_name} merely glances at you, continuing its rummaging without malice or excitement.
You attempt a balanced pat, but {pet_name} shifts unexpectedly, tangling itself in old netting and flopping over!

Curious.message: You hold out your hand, and {pet_name} sniffs each finger curiously. It then allows a slight pat on its ringed tail.
It’s too busy exploring a new stash of trash, ignoring your pat as it unearths treasure: a half-eaten donut!
{pet_name} tries to investigate your pockets, loses balance, and falls into a tipped-over garbage bin!

Relaxed.message: You find {pet_name} lounging in a comfy nest of newspapers. A gentle pat gets a soft chitter of contentment.
{pet_name} is so calm it barely acknowledges your pat, continuing to sprawl among discarded wrapping papers.
You pat it a bit too enthusiastically, and {pet_name} rolls over in surprise, tumbling off its cozy trash pile!

Embarrassed.message: You pat {pet_name} gently, and {pet_name} hides its face behind its paws, flustered but somewhat appreciative.
It seems too shy to accept your pat, turning away and pretending to rummage with forced nonchalance.
Trying to act cool, {pet_name} attempts a fancy climb but slips, toppling headfirst into a trash lid with a loud clang!

Nervous.message: You stay still, letting {pet_name} approach on its own. Eventually, it sniffs you and allows a quick pat before retreating.
The raccoon jitters at every noise, flinching away each time you try to pat it.
A sudden crash spooks {pet_name}, sending {pet_name} fleeing into a pile of glass bottles, clinking and crashing!

Unmotivated.message: You pat {pet_name}, encouraging it to rummage. {pet_name} sluggishly sifts through trash, seeming a bit more engaged.
Your {pet_name} hardly stirs despite your pat, lacking the energy even to rummage properly.
You nudge {pet_name} to move, but {pet_name} halfheartedly slips on a wet cardboard, faceplanting into scraps of takeout!

Depressed.message: You lightly drizzle water around {pet_name} and give {pet_name}'s shell a gentle pat. {pet_name} peeks out just a bit, as if feeling slightly better.
You tap on {pet_name}'s shell, but {pet_name} remains retracted, unmoving, too down to respond.
You pat the shell too firmly, causing {pet_name} to jolt inside and bump its tender body against the shell walls.

Frustrated.message: You pour a light mist of water and pat {pet_name}’s shell. {pet_name} hesitates, then slowly extends its antennae, seeming calmer.
You attempt to stroke its shell, but {pet_name} pulls inside, leaving a trail of slime as if annoyed by your interruption.
Your snail tries to scoot away quickly but flips sideways on a slippery rock, landing with a dull thud!

Happy.message: You pat {pet_name}’s shell with a gentle finger. {pet_name} extends its eye-stalks proudly, gliding in a cheerful swirl.
You try to pat it, but {pet_name} is happily inching around, ignoring your attempts as it explores a dew-covered leaf.
Excitedly wiggling its tentacles, {pet_name} misjudges the edge and slips off the terrarium’s log!

Sad.message: You gently rub water across {pet_name}'s shell. {pet_name} peeks out, tentacles drooping, but nudges your finger as if seeking comfort.
You pat near {pet_name}, but {pet_name} stays inside, leaving only a sad little trail of slime behind.
Startled by your hand, {pet_name} retracts too fast and bangs its shell on a rock, letting out a silent snail sigh.

Angry.message: You mist {pet_name}’s enclosure and tap softly on its shell. {pet_name} quivers in annoyance but eventually stops retracting.
Your snail flares its eye-stalks at you (as much as a snail can), refusing your pat by oozing away in tiny, angry increments.
It attempts to jerk away, slides off a leaf, and rolls onto its shell with a frustrated squelch!

Afraid.message: You hold your palm near {pet_name}. After a tense moment, {pet_name} cautiously extends one tentacle and inches onto your hand.
Any movement you make sends {pet_name} retreating inside its shell, trembling under a film of slime.
{pet_name} panics, flailing its antennae, and slips off the terrarium wall in a slow-motion tumble!

Excited.message: You pat {pet_name}'s shell, and {pet_name} zooms (relatively speaking) around the terrarium, eye-stalks fully extended!
Your snail is so 'fast' right now that it barely acknowledges your pat, leaving a shining trail of slime as it goes.
In its excitement, {pet_name} climbs the terrarium wall at an odd angle and slips, sliding down with a squeaky scratch!

Lonely.message: You rest your hand in its path, letting {pet_name} explore your skin. It softly bumps your finger, as if relieved to have contact.
You pat {pet_name}’s shell, but {pet_name} remains withdrawn, as if longing for another snail friend to slime around with.
Hoping for companionship, {pet_name} tries to climb onto your hand too eagerly, sliding off and landing on a pebbly surface!

Playful.message: You tap gently on the terrarium floor, and {pet_name} inches over, letting you pat its shell as it wriggles its tentacles happily.
It’s feeling playful but in its own snail-paced way, ignoring your pat to swirl around a leaf instead.
Your snail tries to chase your finger—well, snail-speed chase—and tumbles off a small rock in the process!

Annoyed.message: You barely touch its shell, giving it space. {pet_name} flicks an antenna, irritated, but tolerates your presence.
You pat the snail more firmly, and {pet_name} retracts its eye-stalks in protest, leaving a trail of miffed slime.
You corner {pet_name} for a pat, and it tries to retreat quickly, rolling sideways off the moss patch!

Tired.message: You lightly sprinkle water on {pet_name}’s shell, and {pet_name} gives a slow blink, too tired to resist your gentle pat.
Your snail is too exhausted to emerge, ignoring your pat as it rests, half-in and half-out of its shell.
It tries to shrink away from your pat but collapses onto the terrarium floor with a dull thud, too drained to keep moving.

Bored.message: You rearrange a few leaves and give {pet_name} a light pat. {pet_name} extends its antennae, exploring the new layout with mild interest.
You try to poke it into action, but the snail just sits there, seemingly unmotivated and unimpressed.
In an attempt to amuse it, you flick water droplets around, and {pet_name} slips on one, sliding headfirst into a rock!

Equal.message: You place your hand flat, letting {pet_name} approach on its own terms. It slowly glides onto your palm, accepting a polite pat.
The snail regards your hand neutrally, continuing its slow slime trail without hostility or enthusiasm.
You try a respectful pat, but {pet_name} squirms, losing suction and sliding off your palm with a soft thunk!

Curious.message: You let {pet_name} investigate your finger first. It touches your skin with its antennae before allowing a gentle shell pat.
It’s too busy exploring a tiny crevice in the terrarium to notice your pat attempt.
While examining your hand, {pet_name} creeps too far off the terrarium edge and plops onto a damp sponge!

Relaxed.message: You lightly brush {pet_name}’s shell, and {pet_name} continues its leisurely crawl, tentacles at ease in a sign of calm.
Your snail is already so mellow it hardly reacts, continuing its slow, content glide along the moss.
You pat a bit too vigorously, and {pet_name} lurches forward, nearly flipping onto its back in surprise!

Embarrassed.message: You pat {pet_name} softly, and {pet_name} retreats shyly, then peeks out again as if it’s uncertain about being watched.
You stare too intently at {pet_name}. It blushes in snail-fashion, receding into its shell and refusing your pat.
Flustered, {pet_name} tries to scoot away quickly, slips on its own slime, and bumps its shell on a pebble!

Nervous.message: You keep still, letting {pet_name} extend its antennae to verify safety. Slowly, {pet_name} tolerates a gentle tap on its shell.
{pet_name} retracts at the slightest motion, refusing all contact, its antennae trembling with worry.
Startled by a sudden movement, {pet_name} jerks backward, tipping its entire shell off a small ledge in the terrarium!

Unmotivated.message: You gently tilt {pet_name}'s shell, adding a slight pat. {pet_name} sluggishly stirs, coaxed into moving a few steps.
No matter how you pat, {pet_name} stays in place, antennae drooping as if it can’t be bothered.
You nudge it for motivation, but {pet_name} flops sideways, shell clacking on a rock as it slides inertly.

Depressed.message: You gently press your fingertip against the soil near {pet_name}. It emerges slightly, as if sensing a bit of warmth and solace.
You attempt to pat {pet_name}, but it remains coiled in the dirt, barely reacting.
You tap too forcefully, causing a small clod of soil to collapse onto {pet_name}, burying it momentarily!

Frustrated.message: You carefully scoop up {pet_name} and let it wriggle on your palm, offering a slow, calming pat. Its frantic movements ease up a bit.
You try to pat {pet_name} gently, but it twists in agitation, slipping through your fingers into the soil again.
The worm flails in frustration when you pat it, tangling itself in a root and thrashing so hard it tears the root free!

Happy.message: You pat {pet_name}’s soft segments gently, and {pet_name} wriggles playfully, seeming content in its squishy way.
Your worm is happily tunneling through moist soil and barely notices your pat, continuing its rhythmic wiggle.
Overexcited by your presence, {pet_name} surfaces too quickly and tumbles off the edge of its container!

Sad.message: You moisten the soil and pat {pet_name}’s body gently, as if offering a small hug. {pet_name} inches closer to your hand, a bit less forlorn.
Your pat goes unnoticed; {pet_name} remains half-buried, looking droopy and unresponsive.
Startled by your pat, {pet_name} wriggles up too fast, flinging itself onto a dry patch, squirming uncomfortably!

Angry.message: You gently scoop up {pet_name}, letting it coil in your palm before patting it softly. Eventually, it stops thrashing.
Your worm flops furiously in the soil as you pat it, refusing to calm down or accept your attempt.
It lashes about at your touch, tangling itself in loose earth. In its rage, it whips out and nearly splits a tiny root!

Afraid.message: You move very slowly, letting {pet_name} sense your warmth. Eventually, it relaxes enough for a gentle pat along its body.
Your sudden approach makes {pet_name} recoil deeper into the soil, too scared to be patted.
Spooked by your hand, the worm flails up and out of the container, landing with a splat on the table!

Excited.message: You pat {pet_name}’s segments, and {pet_name} wriggles in a joyful spin, as if celebrating your presence in its earthy realm.
Your worm is so giddy, it tunnels rapidly and barely lets you pat it at all, popping up in random spots.
In its excitement, {pet_name} flops out of your hand, smacking into a shovel handle with a squirmy thud!

Lonely.message: You rest your hand in the soil. {pet_name} edges closer, brushing your fingers as if seeking company, and you pat it softly.
You try a comforting pat, but it just burrows deeper, longing for another worm companion instead.
In a desperate attempt for closeness, {pet_name} flings itself onto your hand but slips and tumbles onto a dry patch!

Playful.message: You wiggle your fingers in the soil, and {pet_name} does a wriggly dance, letting you pat its plump body in mid-squirm.
Too busy performing its wriggle routine, the worm just flips around the dirt, ignoring your attempts to pat.
The worm tries to follow your finger playfully but smacks headfirst into a small rock, dazing itself!

Annoyed.message: You barely touch {pet_name}’s body, giving it space. It writhes a bit but tolerates your presence.
You press your pat too firmly, and {pet_name} flings itself away, squiggling in obvious annoyance.
Your persistent pat makes {pet_name} thrash, tangling itself in clumps of dirt before flopping out in a mini worm tantrum.

Tired.message: You lightly brush soil around {pet_name} and pat it gently. {pet_name} gives a half-hearted wriggle before resting again.
No matter how you pat, the worm remains limp in the soil, too worn out to respond.
Your pat jolts {pet_name} unexpectedly, causing it to jolt upright and then collapse in a sluggish coil.

Bored.message: You shift some pebbles around, offering a fresh path. {pet_name} perks up slightly, letting you pat it as it investigates.
You try tapping the worm, but it just lies there, occasionally wriggling with bored disinterest.
Hoping to entertain it, you swirl some water around. The worm tries to chase the flow but accidentally flops onto a dry spot!

Equal.message: You place your hand at soil level, letting {pet_name} crawl onto you by choice. It settles, allowing a respectful pat in return.
The worm acknowledges you only by slithering around your finger once, then continues its daily wriggle, seemingly unmoved.
You attempt a balanced pat, but {pet_name} slides off your palm mid-pat, flopping onto a bit of gravel!

Curious.message: You let {pet_name} nuzzle your hand, and {pet_name} eagerly explores each groove. It seems so intrigued it doesn't mind a gentle pat afterward.
The worm is too busy poking around the pot’s edges, ignoring your attempts to pat its squishy segments.
While investigating your fingertip, {pet_name} overreaches and tumbles off the container’s rim!

Relaxed.message: You pat {pet_name} lightly, and {pet_name} glides through the soil with slow, content undulations, unbothered by your touch.
Your worm is so calm it barely reacts, continuing its lazy inch-by-inch journey under the surface.
You pat it a bit too enthusiastically, causing {pet_name} to slip free of the soil and plop on your shoe, surprised!

Embarrassed.message: You gently stroke {pet_name}, and {pet_name} wriggles shyly, half-burying itself in the soil as if bashful about the attention.
Your gaze makes {pet_name} recoil deeper into the dirt, seemingly too flustered to accept your pat.
Flustered by your attention, the worm tries to slink away but knots itself awkwardly around a pebble!

Nervous.message: You keep still, letting {pet_name} sense no threat. After a moment, it allows a gentle pat, trembling less with each movement.
Any small shift in your hand sends {pet_name} burrowing in panic, too anxious to be patted.
A sudden noise alarms {pet_name} mid-pat, making it thrash out of the soil and flump onto the table surface!

Unmotivated.message: You gently tilt {pet_name}’s body, patting it in a friendly nudge. It lazily resumes squirming through the soil.
No matter how you pat, the worm stays coiled in one place, showing zero interest in moving.
You try to encourage it with a pat, but {pet_name} flops sideways out of your hand, landing with a soft splat on dry ground!
